src_text: Puo ya Maemo a Set haba (SoNA) Kabinete e amogela SoNA ya 2019 ya Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa, eo e supang dingwaga di le 25 tsa Kopanotshwaraganelo ya ntlha ya Aforika Borwa wa temokeras Bontsi jwa maAforika Borwa, le bona ba amogela puo, eo e tswelelang go neelana ka tsholofelo le nt hwafats Moporesidente Ramaphosa o buile ka kgatelolepe e e dirilweng mo ngwageng o o fetilen Re agelela mo dikatlegong tseno, Moporesidente o tlhagisitse dintlhatebelelo tsa monongwag Tseno di tsenyeleditse go tswelela ka mekgwa ya tsenogare go itlhaganedisa kgolo ya ikonomi e e tsenyeletsang botlhe le go tlhama ditiro; go tsosolosa tsamaiso ya thuto ya rona le go tlhabolola bokgoni tebang le isago le go oketsa ntwa kgatlhanong le bonweenwee le go gogwa ga puso ka nk Mo bekeng e e latelang, Tona ya Matlotlo Tito Mboweni o tla tlhalosa ka botlalo leano la dit helete fa a neela Puo ya gagwe ya Tekanyetsokab Ka go dirisa dipuo tsa thebolo ya tekanyetsokabo tsa mafapha, Ditona di tla tlhalosa maano a tiragatso a bona ao a tla diragatsang SoNA ya Moporesident Kabinete e santse e itomile sesino go isa naga ya rona kwa go fitlheleleng Pono ya 2030 ya Leano la Tlhabololo la Boset haba (NDP), lenaanetheo la go fedisa bohuma le go fokotsa go sa lekaleneng mo nageng ka 203 Indaba ya Meepo ya Aforika Aforika Borwa e tshwere ka katlego Peeletso ya Indaba ya Meepo ya Aforika ya bo 25th ya ngwaga le ngwaga, eo e leng kokoano e kgolo ya lefatshe ya batsholadi ere ba meepo le badiraditshwets Mo letsholong la go ngoka peeletso mo go tsa meepo, indaba ya monongwaga e ne e tsherwe ka fa tlase ga setlhogo:
trg_text: facilitated opportunities in the country s oil and gas sector for growth and investmen South Africa has potential resources of nine billion barrels of oil and 60 tcf (trillion cubic feet) or 11 billion barrels of oil equivalent of gas offshor Cabinet has lauded the offshore discovery of gas condensate by oil company Total that could contain one billion barrels of resources, which will significantly boost the country's oil and gas supplie The discovery was made by the company after drilling at its Brulpadda prospects in the Outeniqua basin, about 175 kilometres (km) off the coast of South Africa 32nd Ordinary Session of the African Union (AU) Cabinet congratulates the appointment of President Ramaphosa as Chair of the AU for 2020.

src_text: Go tshegetsa Tlhabololo e e Tsepameng ya Ikonomi ya Aforik
trg_text: Championing Africa s Sustainable Economic Development .

src_text: Kabinete e amogela tumelano e e saenilweng ya batsholadi ere ba meep Tumelano e tla fitlhelela kwa kgakala go isa go tsweletso ya dipeeletso tsa bodit haba ka tlhamalalo mo diseketareng tse di farologaneng tsa intaseteri ya meep Puso, ka Pholisi ya Intaseteri ya Leano la Tiro ya Lefapha la Kgwebisano le Intaseteri (dti), le supile kaonafatso ya diminerale e le karolo eo e tlhagisang bontsi jwa dit hono tseo babeeletsi ba ka di dirisang go godisa lekala la meep Seno se neelana ka kgonagalo e kgolo ya go ka nna le seabe mo go godiseng ikonomi, go tlhama ditiro, go fetola le go fedisa bohuma Eskom Tona ya Dikgwebo tsa Set haba Pravin Gordan o itsisitse Kabinete ka ga go timiwa ga motlakase go go diragalang ga jaana go go amileng tsamaiso ya ikonomi go ralala nag Dikgoreletsi tseno di nnile le seabo se se golo go gaisa mo matshelong a maAforika Borwa le mo ikonomin Motswedi wa eneji wa Aforika Borwa o nna o le botlhokwa thata mme seemo sa ga jaana kwa Eskom e baya pele matshosetsi a a bonalang go naga, maemo a a tlhomameng a dit helete a sona le ikonom Togamaano ya go tlhatlhomolola Eskom go nna ditheo tse tharo tse di ikemetseng tsa Puso
trg_text: Cabinet welcomes the signed mining stakeholder compac The compact will go a long way towards promoting foreign direct investments in different sectors of the mining industr Government, through the Department of Trade and Industry s (the dti) Industrial Policy Action Plan, has identified mineral beneficiation as an area that presents an abundance of opportunities that investors can take advantage of to grow the mining secto This provides massive potential of contributing to growing the country s economy, creating jobs, transformation and eradicating poverty ESKOM Public Enterprises Minister Pravin Gordan briefed Cabinet on the recent load-shedding that affected the running of the economy across the countr These disruptions have had an immeasurable impact on South African households and the econom

src_text: tlhagiso; phetiso le kabo phatlhalatso - e a tlhokega tebang le paka e telele ya go ikemela ga setheo sa motlakase le nag Go mekamekana le seemo sa ga jaana, Moporesidente Ramaphosa o thapile Komiti e e Kgethegileng ya Kabinete ya Eskom e e eteletsweng pele ke Motlatsa Moporesidente le go diriwa ke Tona ya Lefapha la Dikgwebo tsa Puso: Tona ya Lefapha la Eneji: Tona ya Lefapha la Matlotlo: Tona ya Lefapha la Dipalangwa; Tona ya Tshireletso ya Puso le Tona ya Sepodis Komiti eno e tla mekamekana le merero ya Eskom letsatsi le letsatsi le go rebola dipegelo tsa letsatsi le letsatsi go Moporesidente ka ga gore ke dikgato dife tse di tlhokang go tsewa go bona motswedi wa enej Setlhopha se solofetswe go kopana le baamegi botlhe go thusa go busetsa seemong tsepamo ya kiriti le go betla tsela e e yang kwa pele fa ba ntse ba netefatsa gore go na le ditshenyegelo tsa ikonomi tse di nnye go badirisi le go baduela lekgetho Tshwanelo ya go tlhopha Kabinete e akgola maAforika Borwa otlhe, bogolosegolo diketekete tsa ba wa le batlhophi bao e tla bong e le lekgetlo la ntlha ba tlhopha, bao ba tsereng karolo mo mafelong a beke a bofelo a go ikwadisetsa go tlhopha ka la bo 26 le la bo 27 Ferikgong 2019 pele naga e tshwara ditlhopho tsa borataro tsa ditlhopho tsa boset haba le tsa diporofense ka la bo 8 Motsheganong 2012.
trg_text: To address the recent situation, President Ramaphosa has appointed a Special Cabinet Committee on Eskom led by the Deputy President and comprising the Ministers of Public Enterprises; Energy; Finance; Transport; Intelligence and Polic This committee will deal with matters of Eskom daily and deliver daily reports to the President on what actions need to be taken to secure energy suppl The team is expected to meet with all stakeholders to help restore stability to the grid and chart a way forward whilst ensuring that there is minimal economic cost to the consumer and taxpayers Right to vote Cabinet congratulates all South Africans, especially thousands of young and first-time voters, who participated in the last voter registration weekend on 26 and 27 January 2019 before the country holds its sixth democratic national and provincial elections on 8 May 2019.

src_text: Kabinete e ikuela go batlhophi botlhe ba ba dumeletsweng go dirisa tshwanelo ya bona ka tlhomamo le go ikuela go maAforika Borwa bao ba iseng ba ikwadisetse go tlhopha, go dira jalo kwa dikantorong tsa Khomi ene e e Ikemetseng ya Ditlhopho (IEC) tse di butsweng go ralala nag O ka nna wa tlhola maemo a gago a ikwadiso ya go tlhopha ka go romela nomoro ya gago ya boitshupo ka molaetsakhutshwe (SMS) go 32810 (SMS e le nngwe ke R) kgotsa o ka tsenya epe ya batlhophi ya mahala ya IEC mo mogaleng wa gago wa seatla le go e dirisetsa go tlhola dintlha tsa gago tsa ikwadis E sale re bona temokerasi, re agile temokerasi ya molaotheo e e golang ka ditheo tse di netefatsang ditshwanelo tsa motheo tsa rona le dikgololeseg Go ya pele, go tsentswe manaane mo tirisong go fetola ikonomi le go arabela bontsi jwa dikgwetlho tsa rona tsa ikonomi ya loag Ditlhopho tse di tlang ke t hono ya losika le le leswa la ba wa ba maAforika Borwa go dirisa tshwanelo ya bona ya go tlhopha, le go tlhagisa maikutlo a bona ka isago ya bona le ya naga Go Ribololwa ga oli le gase ke setlamo sa Total
trg_text: Cabinet calls on all eligible voters to exercise their right responsibly and appeals to South Africans who have not yet registered to vote, to do so at Independent Electoral Commission (IEC) offices which are open around the countr You can also check your voter registration status by sending an SMS with your ID number to 32810 (R per SMS) or install the IEC s free mobile app for voters and use it to check your registration detail Since the birth of our democracy, we have built a thriving constitutional democracy with institutions that ensure our basic rights and freedom Furthermore, programmes have been implemented to structurally transform the economy and address our many socio-economic challenge The upcoming elections are an opportunity for a new generation of young South Africans to exercise their right to vote, and have a say in their future and that of our country Total oil and gas discovery

src_text: ka Operation Phakisa ya Ikonomi ya Mawatle - e kgontshitse dit hono mo lekaleng la oli le gase tebang le kgolo le peelets Aforika Borwa e na le metswedi e e nang le bokgoni ya dibarele di le dibilione di le robongwe tsa oli le 60 tcf (boteng jwa dikhubiki di le trilione) kgotsa dibarele di le dibilione di le 11 tse di lekanang le gase kokwa ga lewatl Kabinete e akgotse khamphani ya Total ka thibololo ya gase ya go ya lewatleng eo e ka nnang le dibarele di le bilione o le mongwe wa metswedi, eo e tla thusang ka tlamelo ya oli le gase ka fa nagen Thankgololo e dirilwe ke khamphani morago ga go epa lefelokepo la Brulpadda kwa bodutelong jwa Outeniqua, bokgakala jwa dikilometara di le 175 go tswa mo lebopong la Aforika Borwa Kopano e e Tlwaelegileng ya bo 32 ya Dit haba tse di Kopaneng tsa Aforika (AU) Kabinete e akgola go thapiwa ga Moporesidente Ramaphosa jaaka Modulasetilo wa AU wa 2020.
trg_text: Vaccination started on 14 January 2019, with cattle in affected villages, as well as cattle in the 20 km radius around affected village To date, the total number of cattle vaccinated is over 10 000; they are being marked to distinguish them from others South African Film Summit The South African film industry has long been recognised as a catalyst for economic growth and job creation in South Afric The creative and cultural industry, particularly the film sector, also plays a key role in developing the South African story and contributing to the efforts of nation-building and social cohesio In line with this approach, Cabinet welcomes the first South African Film Summit, held in Johannesburg from 4 to 5 February 2019 under the theme:

src_text: O tla tsaya marapo go tswa go Moporesidente wa Egepeto e leng Moporesidente Abdel Fattah el-Sisi, yoo ga jaana a tshwereng marapo a paka ya gagwe ya 2012.
trg_text: He will take over from Egyptian President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi, who is currently serving his term for 2019.

src_text: Moporesidente Ramaphosa o ne a eteletse pele kemedi ya Aforika Borwa go Kopano e e Tlwaelegileng ya bo 32nd ya Dit haba tse di Kopaneng tsa Aforika ya Ditlhogo tsa Dinaga le Dipuso tsa AU, e e neng e tshwaretswe kwa Addis Ababa, Rephaboliking ya Temokerasi ya Bofederale ya Ethiopia go tloga ka la bo 15 Ferikgong go ya go la bo 11 Tlhakole 2019, ka fa tlase ga setlhogo
trg_text: President Ramaphosa led a South African delegation to the 32nd Ordinary Session of the Assembly of the Heads of State and Government of the AU, held in Addis Ababa, Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia from 15 January to 11 February 2019, under the theme

src_text: Bafaladi, Ba ba boang le Batho ba ba Tserweng kwa Dinageng tsa Bobona: Go isa kwa Ditharabololong tse di Tshwarelelang go Batho bao ba Thopilweng ka Kgang mo Aforika .
trg_text: Refugees, Returnees and Internally Displaced Persons: Towards Durable Solutions to Forced Displacement in Africa .

src_text: Seno se neelane ka serala sa go lebelela le go rarabolola modi o o bakileng go thopa batho ka kgang mo Aforik Aforika Borwa e rometse Mafelo a Kgwebisano e e sa Duelelweng mo Kontinenteng ya Aforika (AfCFTA) ka nako ya samit Merero e go builweng ka yona e tsenyeletsa phetolo ya setheo le go newa matlotlo ga setheo sa kontinente; Kagiso le Pabalesego mo Kontinenteng; ditlhabololo tse di amanang le AfCFTA; le dipuisano tebang le tumelano ya tirisanyo e nt hwa magareng ga Aforika, Caribbean le dinaga tse di tlhabologang tsa Pacific le European Union morago ga-2024.
trg_text: South Africa submitted its Instrument of Ratification of the Agreement on the African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) during the summi Issues deliberated on included the institutional reform and financing of the continental body; Peace and Security on the Continent; developments related to the AfCFTA; and negotiations for a new cooperation agreement between the African, Caribbean and Pacific developing countries and the European Union Post-2020.

src_text: Mo gare ga ngwaga ono, Moporesidente Ramaphosa gape go solofetswe a tla rwala marapo a monnasetilo wa kopano ya Komiti ya Ditlhogo tsa Dinaga le Dipuso ya Phetogo ya Maemo a Bosa (CAHOSCC).
trg_text: During the course of this year, President Ramaphosa is also expected to take chairship of the meeting of the Committee of African Heads of State and Government on Climate Change (CAHOSCC).

src_text: CAHOSCC e tlhomilwe ka 2009 ke Kopano ya AU ya Ditlhogo tsa Dinaga le Dipuso go etelela pele Maemo a a Tshwanang a Aforika ka ga Phetogo ya Maemo a Bosa le mo dipuisanong tsa lefatshe tsa phetogo ya maemo a bos Fa Moporesidente Ramaphosa a rwala marapo a monnasetilo, o tla dira mmogo le ditlhogo tse dingwe tsa naga go netefatsa go tsenngwa tirisong go go atlegileng ga Tumelano ya Paris e e botlhokwa go fokotsa le go itlwaetsa ditlamorago tsa phetogo ya maemo a bos Ka CAHOSCC, Aforika e tla dira kabo e e bonagalang go maiteko a lefatshe tebang le go dira gore go nne le khabono e e kwa tlase le tlhabololo e e mekamekanang le maemo a bosa Thuto e Kgolwane
trg_text: When President Ramaphosa assumes chairship, he will work with other heads of state to ensure successful implementation of the landmark Paris Agreement to mitigate and adapt to the effects of climate chang Through CAHOSCC, Africa will make a significant contribution to the global effort for a low-carbon and climate resilient development Higher education

src_text: Kabinete e romela matshidiso go balosika le ditsala ba moithuti wa kwa Yunibesithi ya Thekenoloji ya Durban, Mlungisi Madonsel Go kgorelediwa ga dithuto le go tswalelwa ga ditheo tsa thuto e kgolwane, bogolosegolo kwa KwaZulu-Natal, eo e bakileng loso le le botlhoko la moithuti yo, ke tlhoba borok Kabinete e ikuela go batshameka karolo botlhe go rarabolola dintlha tseno ka kagis Naga ya rona e tlhoka ba wa ba ba rutegileng go nna le seabe mo kgolong ya ikonomi ya ron Puso, ka Lefapha la Thuto e Kgolwane le Katiso, le thusa ditheo tsa thuto e kgolwane fao di nang le dikgwetlh Tona ya Thuto e Kgolwane le Katiso Naledi Pandor le ena o laetse batsamsisi ba Sekema sa Thuso ya Matlole a Baithuti sa Boset haba go baya kwa godimo go neela baithuti dipoelo Go laola mogare wa bolwetse jwa tlhako le molomo (FMD) Mo go sireletseng boitekanelo jwa set haba, Kabinete e itumeletse tsibogelo le ditsenogare go efoga go anama ga leroborobo la mogare wa FMD kwa Kgaolong ya Vhembe, Limpop Lefapha la Temothuo, Dikgwa le Bodirelatlhapi, mmogo le Mokgatlho wa Nama e Khibidu le baamegi ba bangwe, ba dira mmogo go mekamekana le ntlha eno ka tsela e e tshwaraganetswen Thulaganyo ya moento e simolotse ka la bo 14 Ferikgong 2019, ka go entiwa ga dikgomo tse di leng kwa metseng e e amegileng, ga mmogo le tseo di leng mo mafelong a bokgakala jwa dikilomitara di le 20 ao a dikologileng metse e e amegilen Go fitlha ga jaana, palogotlhe ya dikgomo tse di entilweng ke go feta 10 000; di tshwailwe go di farologanya le tse dingwe Samiti ya Filimi ya Aforika Borwa
trg_text: Cabinet extends condolences to the family and friends of the Durban University of Technology student, Mlungisi Madonsel The disruption of learning and closures of institutions of higher learning, especially in KwaZulu-Natal, which tragically led to the death of this student, are a cause for much concer Cabinet calls on all role-players to resolve issues in a peaceful manne Our country needs educated young speople to contribute to our developmen

src_text: Intaseteri ya Difilimi ya Aforika Borwa ke kgale e lemogilwe jaaka setlhotlheletsi go kgolo ya ikonomi le tlhamo ya ditiro mo Aforika Borw Intaseteri ya botlhami le setso, bogolosegolo seketara ya difilimi, le yona e tshameka karolo e e botlhokwa mo go godiseng kgang ya Aforika Borwa le go nna le seabe go maiteko a kago ya set haba le mo go nneng seoposengw Go ikamagantswe le kgato eno, Kabinete e amogetse Samiti ya Difilimi ya Aforika Borwa ya ntlha, e e neng e tshwaretswe kwa Johannesburg go tloga ka la bo 4 go ya go la bo 5 Tlhakole 2019 ka fa tlase ga setlhogo:

src_text: Go nna Seoposengwe le Kago ya Set haba1 Le fa set haba sa rona se dirile go tlala seatla e sale 1994, magora a maitirelo a a ikaegileng ka lotso, boemo le dipharologano tsa setso di tswelela go nyatsa maiteko a ron Mo ntlheng eno, Kabinete e atlenegisitse Ntlhatebo ya Sepolotiki, eo e neelang letlhomeso la molao le pholisi go tshegetsa kgato ya go nna seoposengwe le ya kago ya set haba fa re tswelela re gatela peleJaaka le tlhagisitswe mo go NDP, letlhomeso leno le tla nna le seabe se segolo thata mo go tsenyeng tirisong maikaelelo a go aga

src_text: Kwalolose wa ya Molaotlhomo wa Bana wa 20191 Kabinete e atlenegisitse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Molaotlhomo o o Kwalolotsweng Se wa wa Bana wa 2019 go matlafatsa tiro ya set haba sa rona mo go sireletseng ditshwanelo tsa banaKa 2017 Senthara ya Molao wa Bana e ne ya tshwarisa Lefapha la Tlhabololo ya Loago ka ga ditshalelo morago tsa botsadi tlhokomeloKgotlatshekelokgolo e ne ya laela Tona ya Tlhabololo ya Loago, gareng ga tse dingwe, go baakanya le go itsise fa pele ga Palamente dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tse di kwalolotsweng se wa mo Molaong wa Bana, 2005 (Molao wa bo 38 wa 2005) le/kgotsa Molao wa Thuso ya Loago, 2004 (Molao wa bo 13 wa 2004) go neelana ka tharabololo ya semolao e e feletseng go arabela dikgwetlho tsa botsadi tlhokomeloBana botlhe ba tshwanetse go itumelela phitlhelelo ya ditirelo tseo maikaelelo a tsone eleng go tsamaisa pabalesego, tlhokomelo le tshireletso ya bona; le tsamaiso e e nonofileng ya katlaatlelo loag Go na le ditlhokego di le dintsi mo tsamaisong ya tshireletso ya bana ya ga jaan Molaotlhomo ono o tla arabela, gareng ga tse dingwe, dikgwetlho tse di amanang le go tlhomiwa le tsamaiso ya botsadi tlhokomelo, le ditlhokomelo tse dingwe tsa bana tse di amanang le merero ya pabaleseg Ditiragalo tse di Tlang12.

src_text: Samiti e e ka ga Ikonomi ya Dijithale1 Phetogo ya lefatshe go ya go thekenoloji e rotloeditse 4IR go tlisa dit hono tse dint hwa go aga set haba sa rona le ikonom Go nna re le kwa pele ga metseletsele e me wa ya thekenoloji, naga e tla tshwara Samiti ya Ikonomi ya Dijithale ka Mopitlwe 201 Samiti e tla tshwarelwa ka fa tlase ga setlhogo sa 4IR Aforika Borwa (4IRSA), kamano magareng ga Lefapha la Mafaratlhatlha a Ditlhaeletsano le Ditirelo tsa Poso, Yunibesithi ya Witwatersrand, Yunibesithi ya Johannesburg le Yunibesithi ya Fort Hare#4IRSA e ikaelela go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di lebaneng Aforika Borwa mo Nakong ya Dijithale gore e tle e bone tsibogelo e e tsepameng ebile e le ya botlhe go nag Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa 2019 tsa Dinaga tsa Mokgatlho wa Tlhabololo ya Borwa jwa Aforika (SADC)1 Jaaka karolo ya go tsweletsa tsenogare ya kgaolo, tirisanommogo le temogo ya botswerere mo bobegakgang, bobegakgang jwa Aforika Borwa bo laleditswe go tsenela Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa SADC tsa 2019 pele ga Tlhakole 2019.

src_text: renditions of well-known liberation struggle song Eno ke Kabo ya Grammy ya boraro ya setlhophBankatlhabololo ya Dibaga tsa Borwa jwa Aforika (DBSA) ka go fenya Kabo ya Lenaneo la Nt hwafatso ya Eneji ya Seaforika e e rebotsweng ke setheo sa kwa London, Project Finance Internationa DBSA e ne ya lemogiwa tebang le boitlhamedi jwa go neela matlotlo go diporojeke tsa nt hwafatso ya eneji di le 14 mo Lenaneong la Nt hwafatso ya Eneji ya Batlhagisi ba ba IkemetsenBorasaense ba babedi ba rona ba fentse Dikabo tsa AU tsa Kwame Nkrumah tsa Matlhale a Saense kgatiso ya 2018 kwa Addis Ababa, Ethiopia ka di 11 Tlhakole 2019:Moporofesara Aletta Schutte o fentse sekgele sa kgaolo sa Bomma Saese sa US$20 000 mo mo kgaolong ya Disaense tsa Botshelo le Lefatsh Ke moporofesara wa Fisioloji kwa Yunibesithing ya Bokone Bophirim Moporofesara Schutte o na le makwalo a borutegi a SARChI ka ga Go Ribolola go sa le Gale Malwetsi a amanang le Pelo mo Aforika le go a Thibela, modulasetilo wa patlisiso o neelwa matlotlo ke Lefapha la Saense le Thekenoloji (DST).
trg_text: through Operation Phakisa for the Oceans Economy

src_text: Patlisiso ya gagwe e lebeletse thata mo bolwetseng jwa kgatelelo ya madi le kgolo ya bona mo dit habeng tsa AforikMoporofesara David Mark Richardson o fentse sekgele sa kontinente sa US$100 000 tebang le kgaolo ya Lefatshe le Saense ya Botshel Ke Moporofesara yo o Itsegeng wa Ikholoji kwa Yunibesithing ya Stellenbosch, le Mokaedi wa Senthara ya Naga ya Dipatlisiso tsa Motheo wa Matlhale a Thutatshelo ya Dimela tsa Bodit haba ya DS Patlisiso ya gagwe e mekamekana le go tlhaloganya dintlha tse di amanang le dimela tsa ditlhare tsa bodit habSetlhopha sa kgwele ya dinao sa ba ba kwa tlase ga dingwaga di le 20, Amajita, go bona tetla ya go tshameka kwa Sejaneng sa Lefatshe sa 2019 sa FIFA, seo se tla tshwarelwang kwa Poland ka Motsheganong 2019.
trg_text: generation; transmission and distribution -

src_text: Amajita ba bone manno a bona ka go fetela go dika makgaolakgang a Khonfederei ene ya Kgwele ya Dinao ya Sejana sa Dinaga tsa Aforika e ga jaana e tsweletseng kwa NigeDipotsolotso:Mme Phumla Williams
